019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common;
020
021import io.kubernetes.client.common.KubernetesListObject;
022import io.kubernetes.client.common.KubernetesObject;
023import io.kubernetes.client.custom.V1Patch;
024import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiClient;
025import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
026import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.apis.ApisApi;
027import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.apis.CustomObjectsApi;
028import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1APIGroup;
029import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1ConfigMap;
030import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1ConfigMapList;
031import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1GroupVersionForDiscovery;
032import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1ObjectMeta;
033import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1ObjectReference;
034import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1PersistentVolumeClaim;
035import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1PersistentVolumeClaimList;
036import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1Pod;
037import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1PodList;
038import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.GenericKubernetesApi;
039import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.DynamicKubernetesApi;
040import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.DynamicKubernetesObject;
041import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.options.DeleteOptions;
042import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.options.PatchOptions;
043import java.util.Optional;
044
045/**
046 * Helpers for K8s API.
047 */
048@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.ShortClassName", "PMD.UseUtilityClass",
049    "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis" })
050public class K8s {
051
052    /**
053     * Given a groupVersion, returns only the version.
054     *
055     * @param groupVersion the group version
056     * @return the string
057     */
058    public static String version(String groupVersion) {
059        return groupVersion.substring(groupVersion.lastIndexOf('/') + 1);
060    }
061
062    /**
063     * Get PVC API.
064     *
065     * @param client the client
066     * @return the generic kubernetes api
067     */
068    public static GenericKubernetesApi<V1PersistentVolumeClaim,
069            V1PersistentVolumeClaimList> pvcApi(ApiClient client) {
070        return new GenericKubernetesApi<>(V1PersistentVolumeClaim.class,
071            V1PersistentVolumeClaimList.class, "", "v1",
072            "persistentvolumeclaims", client);
073    }
074
075    /**
076     * Get config map API.
077     *
078     * @param client the client
079     * @return the generic kubernetes api
080     */
081    public static GenericKubernetesApi<V1ConfigMap,
082            V1ConfigMapList> cmApi(ApiClient client) {
083        return new GenericKubernetesApi<>(V1ConfigMap.class,
084            V1ConfigMapList.class, "", "v1", "configmaps", client);
085    }
086
087    /**
088     * Get pod API.
089     *
090     * @param client the client
091     * @return the generic kubernetes api
092     */
093    public static GenericKubernetesApi<V1Pod, V1PodList>
094            podApi(ApiClient client) {
095        return new GenericKubernetesApi<>(V1Pod.class, V1PodList.class, "",
096            "v1", "pods", client);
097    }
098
099    /**
100     * Get the API for a custom resource.
101     *
102     * @param client the client
103     * @param group the group
104     * @param kind the kind
105     * @param namespace the namespace
106     * @param name the name
107     * @return the dynamic kubernetes api
108     * @throws ApiException the api exception
109     */
110    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseObjectForClearerAPI")
111    public static Optional<DynamicKubernetesApi> crApi(ApiClient client,
112            String group, String kind, String namespace, String name)
113            throws ApiException {
114        var apis = new ApisApi(client).getAPIVersions();
115        var crdVersions = apis.getGroups().stream()
116            .filter(g -> g.getName().equals(group)).findFirst()
117            .map(V1APIGroup::getVersions).stream().flatMap(l -> l.stream())
118            .map(V1GroupVersionForDiscovery::getVersion).toList();
119        var coa = new CustomObjectsApi(client);
120        for (var crdVersion : crdVersions) {
121            var crdApiRes = coa.getAPIResources(group, crdVersion)
122                .getResources().stream().filter(r -> kind.equals(r.getKind()))
123                .findFirst();
124            if (crdApiRes.isEmpty()) {
125                continue;
126            }
127            @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops")
128            var crApi = new DynamicKubernetesApi(group,
129                crdVersion, crdApiRes.get().getName(), client);
130            var customResource = crApi.get(namespace, name);
131            if (customResource.isSuccess()) {
132                return Optional.of(crApi);
133            }
134        }
135        return Optional.empty();
136    }
137
138    /**
139     * Get an object from its metadata.
140     *
141     * @param <T> the generic type
142     * @param <LT> the generic type
143     * @param api the api
144     * @param meta the meta
145     * @return the object
146     */
147    public static <T extends KubernetesObject, LT extends KubernetesListObject>
148            Optional<T>
149            get(GenericKubernetesApi<T, LT> api, V1ObjectMeta meta) {
150        var response = api.get(meta.getNamespace(), meta.getName());
151        if (response.isSuccess()) {
152            return Optional.of(response.getObject());
153        }
154        return Optional.empty();
155    }
156
157    /**
158     * Delete an object.
159     *
160     * @param <T> the generic type
161     * @param <LT> the generic type
162     * @param api the api
163     * @param object the object
164     */
165    public static <T extends KubernetesObject, LT extends KubernetesListObject>
166            void delete(GenericKubernetesApi<T, LT> api, T object)
167                    throws ApiException {
168        api.delete(object.getMetadata().getNamespace(),
169            object.getMetadata().getName()).throwsApiException();
170    }
171
172    /**
173     * Delete an object.
174     *
175     * @param <T> the generic type
176     * @param <LT> the generic type
177     * @param api the api
178     * @param object the object
179     */
180    public static <T extends KubernetesObject, LT extends KubernetesListObject>
181            void delete(GenericKubernetesApi<T, LT> api, T object,
182                    DeleteOptions options) throws ApiException {
183        api.delete(object.getMetadata().getNamespace(),
184            object.getMetadata().getName(), options).throwsApiException();
185    }
186
187    /**
188     * Apply the given patch data.
189     *
190     * @param <T> the generic type
191     * @param <LT> the generic type
192     * @param api the api
193     * @param existing the existing
194     * @param update the update
195     * @throws ApiException the api exception
196     */
197    public static <T extends KubernetesObject, LT extends KubernetesListObject>
198            T apply(GenericKubernetesApi<T, LT> api, T existing, String update)
199                    throws ApiException {
200        PatchOptions opts = new PatchOptions();
201        opts.setForce(true);
202        opts.setFieldManager("kubernetes-java-kubectl-apply");
203        var response = api.patch(existing.getMetadata().getNamespace(),
204            existing.getMetadata().getName(), V1Patch.PATCH_FORMAT_APPLY_YAML,
205            new V1Patch(update), opts).throwsApiException();
206        return response.getObject();
207    }
208
209    /**
210     * Create an object reference.
211     *
212     * @param object the object
213     * @return the v 1 object reference
214     */
215    public static V1ObjectReference
216            objectReference(DynamicKubernetesObject object) {
217        return new V1ObjectReference().apiVersion(object.getApiVersion())
218            .kind(object.getKind())
219            .namespace(object.getMetadata().getNamespace())
220            .name(object.getMetadata().getName())
221            .resourceVersion(object.getMetadata().getResourceVersion())
222            .uid(object.getMetadata().getUid());
223    }
224}
